Author: litas-f
Text: i am back to my normal?? imo fat ass weight and not a second passes i dont actively hate myself for it  stay strong

Author: pabstpumpkinbeer
Text: I feel this so hard, I'm literally in the same position right now.   What helps me (and take this or leave it, if it doesn't help you then just ignore it) is knowing that I have been in this position MULTIPLE times in the past decade of having an ED. And I know that periods of restriction, for me, are always followed by periods of bingeing. It's biology, it's my body fighting for survival. So... restricting is ultimately futile (in my experience). And the hell of the binge phase is something I really never want to go through again (although lolololol I have done this to myself countless times now!)
